original_text: You have just now told me about the good you did to me; the Lord delivered me into your hands, but you did not kill me.
korean_text: 네가 나 선대한 것을 오늘 나타냈나니 여호와께서 나를 네 손에 넘기셨으나 네가 나를 죽이지 아니하였도다

sentences.original_text: You have just now told me
about the good you did to me
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 나에게 행한 선한 일에 대해

sentences.original_text: the Lord delivered me into your hands
but you did not kill me
